short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a fascinating fact every day! Make sure to turn notifications on for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Fact gives you a random fact once per day! This Chrome extension will display a random fact via Chrome notification so make sure you have notifications enabled! 

Version 1.2:
Added 70 New Facts!
Doubled notification display timer 

Mac: System Settings > Notifications > Google Chrome > Allow Notifications
